scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass src/assets/stylesheets/ -o public/css/ --watch
scripts.build: node src/loader.js && npm run build-css && react-scripts build
scripts.test: node test/loader-test.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --opts test/mocha.opts --require ignore-styles test/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/**/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/**/libraries/**/__specs__/*.spec.js
scripts.test-dot: node test/loader-test.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --opts test/mocha.opts --require ignore-styles --reporter dot test/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/**/__specs__/*.spec.js src/**/**/libraries/**/__specs__/*.spec.js
scripts.lint: echo 'Start lint...' && node node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint.js --format node_modules/eslint-friendly-formatter src/* test/*.js && echo '...done'
scripts.integration-test: node test/loader-test.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --opts test/mocha.opts --timeout 20000 src/**/__specs__/*.integration.js src/**/**/__specs__/*.integration.js src/**/**/libraries/**/__specs__/*.integration.js
scripts.integration-test-dot: node test/loader-test.js && node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --opts test/mocha.opts --reporter dot --timeout 20000 src/**/__specs__/*.integration.js src/**/**/__specs__/*.integration.js src/**/**/libraries/**/__specs__/*.integration.js
